text: Elspeth Thompson (26 June 1961 – 25 March 2010) was a British author and journalist. She studied History and History of Art at Trinity College, Cambridge. She was the author of many books including A Tale of Two Gardens (2003), The London Gardener (2004) and The Wonderful Weekend Book (2008). She also presented a four-part series on trees for BBC Radio 4, and wrote on gardening and interiors for The Sunday Telegraph, the Observer and the Guardian. == References == *Obituary in Daily Telegraph *Profile in the Guardian Category:1961 births Category:2010 deaths
title: Elspeth Thompson
